title: Bruce Springsteen cancels the North Carolina party on "The Law of the Bathroom "
subtitle: Rock Bros Springsteen apologized to fans in Tar Hill State after the annulment of a controversial bill for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender persons.
author: Brooke Binkowski
vclaim: Bruce Springsteen cancelled an offer in Grinsboro, North Carolina, to the so-called state bathroom law.
